description: This HTML file implements a database visualizer web interface with a sidebar listing databases, expandable tables, and a main content area displaying table data with interactive features such as cell expansion and dynamic data loading via fetch API.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the backend API and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases, resets UI states.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database to show its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads data for a selected table and renders it in the main content area.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Creates an HTML table from the data and inserts it into the DOM.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell content, handling objects, long strings, nulls, and expandable cells.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses a cell to show full content, toggling between truncated and full view.
